title: The Writer's Almanac - Sunday, January 31, 2021
description: Today is the birthday of Nobel Prize-winning Japanese author Kenzaburō Ōe, who has explored parental guilt and shame in several books influenced by his disabled son Hikari.
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
itunes:subtitle: Today is the birthday of Nobel Prize-winning Japanese author Kenzaburō Ōe, who has explored parental guilt and shame in several books influenced by his disabled son Hikari.
